name: Mirabel Madrigal Jump Ball
description:
It’s time to Hop! Now you can upload your own unlimited favorite songs Mirabel Madrigal to play with tiles hop music game.
Magic tiles beat hop EDM rush music games is one of the best musical ball games where you can find yourself
as a game player and as a singer in one place where you can gain tiles so it is also the title app

How to play
1. Touch, Hold and Drag the ball to make it jump on the Tiles.
2. Don't Miss the Tiles!
3. You can now upload your own songs to play
4. Enjoy the awesome music and addictive challenges designed for each song.
